name: dining_room
description: You entered a large, sumptuous dining room.

facts.description: In the center of the room is a dinner table.
Hanging above the table is a chandelier.
A dead body is dangling on a rope from the chandelier.
To the left of the table is a door to the living room.
To the right of the table is a door to the kitchen.
At the back of the table is a large window.

interactions.description: The player moves around in the room.
interactions.effect: Update his position in the description.
